metadata.title: CVE-2022-42256 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Linux contains a vulnerability in the kernelmode layer (nvidia.ko), where an integer overflow in index validation maylead to denial of service, information disclosure, or data tampering.

criterions.comment: nvidia-graphics-drivers-304: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-340: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
nvidia-graphics-drivers-384 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
